author: Sriram Lakshman
title: COVID-19 and a city’s anatomy
description: How the virus is changing the world and lives
content:
The public health crisis enveloping the world has spared no city, and Washington, DC, where I am normally based, is no exception.
Soon after returning from his trip to India, the citys most high-profile resident, U.S. President Donald Trump, held his first C… [+3821 chars]
